english_example_sentence: By understanding the difficult lesson, the hardworking student became successful.
russian_example_sentence: Поняв сложный урок, прилежный ученик стал успешным.
turkish_example_sentence: Zor dersi anlayarak, çalışkan öğrenci başarılı oldu.
